summary.span: 为基于密码的身份验证方案（如基本、摘要式、NTLM 和 Kerberos 身份验证）提供凭据。

span.span: Provides credentials for password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个基类，用于在基本、摘要式、NTLM 和 Kerberos 等基于密码的身份验证方案中提供凭据。The class is a base class that supplies credentials in password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos. 实现接口的类（ 如 类）返回 对象。Classes that implement the interface, such as the class, return objects. 此类不支持基于公钥的身份验证方法，如安全套接字层 (SSL) 客户端身份验证。This class does not support public key-based authentication methods such as Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) client authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个 对象与中) (uri 的一组统一资源标识符关联起来 。The following code example associates a object with a set of Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) in a . 然后，它将传递 给一个 对象，该对象使用该对象对 Internet 服务器的请求进行身份验证。It then passes the to a object, which uses it to authenticate requests to an Internet server. [!code-cpp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置验证凭据的域名或计算机名。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain or computer name that verifies the credentials.
The name of the domain associated with the credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定用户名所属的域或领域。The property specifies the domain or realm to which the user name belongs. 通常，这是运行应用程序的主机名，或者是当前已登录用户的用户域。Typically, this is the host computer name where the application runs or the user domain for the currently logged in user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性设置与凭据关联的域。The following code example uses the property to set the domain associated with the credentials.
